item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, February 25, 2025 at 4:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Claude 3.7 Sonnet and Claude Code (1403 points | 618 comments)
2. DeepSeek open source DeepEP – library for MoE training and Inference (68 points | 10 comments)
3. It's still worth blogging in the age of AI (125 points | 64 comments)
4. “The closer to the train station, the worse the kebab” – a “study” (227 points | 210 comments)
5. DigiCert: Threat of legal action to stifle Bugzilla discourse (34 points | discuss)
6. Show HN: I built an app to stop me doomscrolling by touching grass (1007 points | 240 comments)
7. Clean Code vs. A Philosophy Of Software Design (92 points | 58 comments)
8. Everyone at NSF overseeing the Platforms for Wireless Experimentation is gone (231 points | 216 comments)
9. US Space Force reveals first look at secretive X-37B space plane in orbit (21 points | 5 comments)
10. While the world builds AI Agents, I'm just building calculators (24 points | 16 comments)
11. Introduction to Stochastic Calculus (339 points | 64 comments)
12. The HP-35: Consumer Electronics, an Origin Story (14 points | 4 comments)
13. Closing the "green gap": energy savings from the math of the landscape function (71 points | 30 comments)
14. Disclosure of personal information to DOGE “is irreparable harm,” judge rules (127 points | 69 comments)
15. Show HN: I made a site to tell the time in corporate (212 points | 99 comments)
16. Breaking into apartment buildings in five minutes on my phone (315 points | 193 comments)
17. The best way to use text embeddings portably is with Parquet and Polars (149 points | 41 comments)
18. Microsoft cancels leases for AI data centers, analyst says (350 points | 286 comments)
19. AI cracks superbug problem in two days that took scientists years (197 points | 89 comments)
20. Launch HN: SubImage (YC W25) – See your infra from an attacker's perspective (102 points | 23 comments)
21. Writing a DSL in Lua (2015) (64 points | 17 comments)
22. Larry Ellison's half-billion-dollar quest to change farming (111 points | 211 comments)
23. I ate and reviewed every snack in our office kitchen (81 points | 63 comments)
24. Student refines 100-year-old math problem, expanding wind energy possibilities (112 points | 15 comments)
25. Only bad poems go viral (38 points | 41 comments)
26. Right to Repair laws have now been introduced in all 50 us states (428 points | 127 comments)
27. Modular forms, the 'fifth fundamental operation' of math (2023) (69 points | 5 comments)
28. The Wrongs of Thomas More (106 points | 62 comments)
29. Ashby (YC W19) Is Hiring Principal Product Engineers ( | hide)
30. Laravel Cloud (157 points | 90 comments)
